title: Interpretation of a dream about a cat scratching my hand

Seeing a cat vomiting in a dream can be evidence of declaring the truth of a certain matter, and God knows best. It can also indicate deception of some people, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of a cat in the shape of a tiger in a dream could be evidence of a warning about a woman’s temptation, and God knows best. Likewise, if a married woman is seen hugging a cat in the shape of a tiger, this may indicate pregnancy, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the Hour of Resurrection in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of the Day of Resurrection and the Day of Resurrection There are many interpretations of the dream of the Day of Resurrection, which is the day on which every human being, whether good or bad, is expected to be responsible for all his actions. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of the vision of the Day of Resurrection and the Day of Resurrection Seeing the Day of Resurrection is a warning and a warning For everyone who clings to the world and its joy and forgets the afterlife. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of the Resurrection also symbolizes the day when all criminals regain their rights and all sinners are punished. The interpretation of the dream on the Day of Resurrection may indicate a long journey or a move to a place different from what the dreamer is accustomed to. And if he discovers that he is alone And no one else, the interpretation of the Day of Resurrection in his dreams proves his resurrection. In other words, his death is near. If the dreamer is a warrior or a soldier, then the interpretation of a dream about the Resurrection represents a victory over the enemy if the enemy is unjust and has an overwhelming victory over the enemy. Ibn Sirin believes that a dream about the Day of Resurrection means justice, truth, and everyone’s share. If one stands in front of God and considers himself responsible for his actions, this indicates that he will survive the wonderful experiences that he goes through. And in a dream on the Day of Resurrection, if you see a human being in a fierce war and the Resurrection occurs, then he will defeat the enemy and achieve all the desired goals if he is right, and this indicates that. And whoever dreams that the Day of Resurrection is alone, his death will appear. And if the Resurrection occurs in a place where God spreads justice, then the interpretation of the vision of the Day of Resurrection here shows that the oppressed are present in this place, for God has their persecutors, and I will harm you. The interpretation of the dream explains the time of Resurrection to remind the dreamer that the day will come. When each person answers for his actions. Seeing the beginning of time in a dream is a sign that we should return to God, stop our sins, stay away from the forbidden path, and avoid suspicious places. On the Day of Resurrection, it appears in dreams that the dreamer is obsessed with the world, its nakedness, and its desires, so he falls into A deep slumber follows the whims of the soul. Seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream shows his great injustice to others when fortune-tellers gather alone. Interpretation of sleep by the clock. If a person knows in a dream that the Day of Resurrection has ended and that he is alive again, this indicates that he is starting a new life. If he sees the Resurrection This indicates that he is unfair to those around him. Looking at the clock in a dream indicates the need for attention, vigilance, and separation from anything that distracts attention from the truth. The vision may remind the viewer of something that he may have overlooked, or of an oath he made with his tongue but forgot. Seeing time also shows repentance Before God, the rejection of sin, and the beginning of a new sin. Interpretation of a dream with signs of the Day of Resurrection. Whoever sees an open grave for people standing on it indicates that he will be fair to people. If he sees him on the Day of Resurrection and fears for him with great fear, this indicates that this person has committed many sins and disobedience and violated his rights. People. If one sees signs of the Day of Resurrection, it symbolizes the spread of corruption, great injustice, tyranny, and chaos. Seeing signs of time indicates the presence of a faint light of hope, and if the dreamer does not catch it, he has a chance

title: Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Dear reader, if you want to know the interpretation of henna in a dream for unmarried women, we present it to you today through the encyclopedia. Many of us see dreams in a dream and we do not know what they mean. They bring evil or good. Many scholars and sheikhs have talked about this matter, but of course it differs from one person to another according to his situation. We will learn about the interpretations of this dream in the following lines. We find that henna is used by women for decoration, and there are different forms and types. It is drawn on the body, in the form of shapes, and sometimes it is placed in the hair, and seeing it in a dream sometimes brings good and sometimes brings evil and evil. Interpretation Henna in a dream by Ibn Sirin: In the general interpretation of Ibn Sirin, if the dreamer sees henna in the hair in a dream, this is a sign of the power that he is blessed with. But if the dreamer sees henna on his left hand, this is a sign of some bad news. But if the dreamer sees henna on his right hand, this is A sign of the abundance of goodness and happiness in all aspects of life. We also find that the appearance of henna in a dream indicates happiness, joy and pleasure. Henna in general in a dream is evidence of happiness, and a blessing present in the life of insight, and it also indicates generosity and a lot of charity. If a woman sees If a sick woman sees henna in a dream, this means that she will soon recover from an illness that accompanied her. Interpretation of henna in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin says: If an unmarried woman sees henna in a dream, and it is poorly drawn and engraved, this indicates that the next husband has bad morals and will not suit her, but will treat her harshly and harshly. , which will do. It makes her feel pain and confusion. However, if an unmarried woman sees henna in a dream and it completely covers her hair, this indicates joy, happiness and pleasure and is evidence of a successful marriage in the future and achieving everything she desires in life. Also, seeing henna in the hair of an unmarried girl shows dominance and strength and shows the intelligence of that woman. The girl and her sound mind. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is putting henna on her hands in the form of inscriptions, the vision is good news for her that her worries will end, her situation will change for the better, and happiness will enter her life. But if the unmarried woman in the dream puts henna on her hands Without inscriptions, this dream indicates that she always glorifies God and that this girl’s morals are good and that she is on the path of guidance. If an unmarried woman sees herself in a dream drawing henna on her legs, this is a sign of good news and that she will get married soon, and the dream may be a sign of her upcoming trip. In general, seeing henna in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her future husband’s love and strong attachment to her, and it also indicates intelligence. Whoever dreams of putting henna on her hair to change its color, this dream means that she is hiding things from those around her and hopes to God that they will not be revealed, as they are indeed. She suffers from it. A single girl’s dream of being sad because she has a henna tattoo on her body indicates that she will be sad in reality because someone proposes to her. Among the prophetic dreams of an unmarried woman is her dream of removing

title: Interpretation of seeing a black horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a black horse in a dream? The horse is one of the animals that many people love to raise. Because it has the characteristics of love, but if one sees it in a dream, what are its connotations and what does it indicate? This is what we present today by knowing the opinion of interpretation scholars about seeing a black horse or horse in a dream, which varies according to the details contained in the visions. Interpretation of a dream about a black horse in a dream: A horse is one of the animals whose vision indicates that the dreamer has strength, courage, and the ability to overcome difficulties and overcome obstacles in the dream. life. Good, and he can obtain a high position in society by climbing the career ladder. But if one sees in his dream that he is riding a horse, then he is the owner of glory or power and has a high status that makes him the focus of everyone’s attention. The owner of this vision has a personality characterized by courage in the face of problems, and she has a tremendous ability to get out of any crisis she faces thanks to her patience and composure. Seeing a black horse in a dream is an indication that goals will be achieved, but after a longer time than the fortuneteller expects, according to the opinion of some interpreters, while Others saw that it shows the speed of achieving the desired goals, and that the dreamer is absolutely determined to achieve what he wants despite all the obstacles that stand before him. Interpretation of a dream about a black horse in a dream for a single woman: This vision is one of the visions that is not popular with the girl, so if she sees it in a dream And she got engaged, her engagement may break up after a while. An indication of a separation in the life of a single person. Either she broke up with her fiancé or a friend who was very close to her recently, but she will discover her hypocrisy with her. The owner of the vision will suffer from many problems in her life, whether personal or professional. If she is an employee, then she will be exposed to the conspiracies of some of her haters and haters, and if she is in the study stage, she may be exposed to a decline in her academic level. This may be evidence of the satisfaction of her desires, but not at the time she desires, as her marriage may be delayed, but in the end she will get a husband of good character unless taken into account. He has a good personality and good morals, and he is also one of the rich, so she lives a calm and reassured life under his care. If a girl sees a horse angry and angry, this vision means that she cannot bear or face difficulties and is characterized by haste in making decisions, and this trait does not bring her good. On the contrary, haste only brings trouble, as the dreamer may fall prey to a bad husband simply because she did not think carefully before deciding to marry him, as she was only thinking of getting rid of parental restrictions. Interpretation of a dream about a black horse in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a horse Black for the married woman: The visionary suffers from many disagreements in her marital life that will continue for some time until she is able to overcome them, and the vision here represents a signal for the woman to use wisdom in managing the affairs of her life so that the reins of affairs do not slip away from her. Her hand and her married life reach the brink of the abyss and she cannot take it off because it was stable. I disagree

title: Interpretation of shaving a beard in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In this article, learn about the interpretation of shaving a beard in a dream and its meaning in detail. The science of dream interpretation is a very complex science and the average person is unable to understand its meanings and translate its symbols. Dream meanings relate to things happening in the dreamer's life, either now or nearby, or reflect his or her situation. Most dreams are ambiguous, such as seeing a beard in a dream and shaving it. What are the symbols and hints of this dream? Interpretation of shaving the beard in a dreamIbn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of shaving the beardAccording to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing the dreamer shaving his entire beard in a dream is an abominable vision and indicates the loss of money or the loss of a loved one for the dreamer, who may be from the family or spouse. If the dreamer sees that he is shaving only half of his beard, then this vision indicates illness or a change in financial circumstances for the worse, and God knows best. Seeing someone growing his beard in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good circumstances, and this dream also indicates hardship and exhaustion. Seeing someone shaving The aspects of the beard only indicate goodness, livelihood, and access, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the dream of shaving the beard. Imam Al-Nabulsi mentioned that seeing a person shaving his beard in a dream is one of the dreamer’s praiseworthy dreams, which indicates achieving the dreamer’s goals on the ground. In the case of complete shaving of the beard, this The vision indicates a lack of livelihood. In the case of shaving only half of the beard, this vision indicates the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life or the loss of money, and God knows best. In the case of shaving and trimming the beard only, this vision indicates good conditions, closeness to God, and a commitment to obey Him. If The dreamer saw that he was shaving his beard from the middle, then this dream indicates that he will get a lot of money. Seeing shaving the beard in a dream symbolizes the death of worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from in reality, and this vision also shows the repayment of debts if the dreamer has debts in reality. If the dreamer sees that his appearance has become better after shaving his beard, then this vision shows goodness and nourishment, but if he sees that his appearance has become bad, then this dream symbolizes the problems that he suffers from in reality. Interpretation of seeing a beard in a dream for a single woman. Seeing shaving a beard in a dream for an unmarried woman It indicates marriage soon, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream someone shaving his beard, and it turns out that this person is the young man she loves in reality, then this dream indicates that there will be problems with him. Interpretation of shaving the beard in a dream for a married woman. Seeing shaving the beard in A dream for a married woman indicates her ability to bear her responsibilities and also shows the collapse of worries and problems. A married woman who sees her husband shaving his beard in a dream indicates marital problems and disagreements. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman shaving her beard in a dream means that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees That her husband shaves his beard, then this vision indicates facilitating childbirth or obtaining money, and God knows best. We present to you the most prominent interpretations of shaving the beard in a dream, and before we conclude this article, we would like to note

Seeing shaving the beard in a dream symbolizes the death of worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from in reality, and this vision also shows the repayment of debts if the dreamer has debts in reality. If the dreamer sees that his appearance has become better after shaving his beard, then this vision shows goodness and nourishment, but if he sees that his appearance has become bad, then this dream symbolizes the problems that he suffers from in reality. Interpretation of seeing a beard in a dream for a single woman. Seeing shaving a beard in a dream for an unmarried woman It indicates marriage soon, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream someone shaving his beard, and it turns out that this person is the young man she loves in reality, then this dream indicates that there will be problems with him. Interpretation of shaving the beard in a dream for a married woman. Seeing shaving the beard in A dream for a married woman indicates her ability to bear her responsibilities and also shows the collapse of worries and problems. A married woman who sees her husband shaving his beard in a dream indicates marital problems and disagreements. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman shaving her beard in a dream means that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees That her husband shaves his beard, then this vision indicates facilitating childbirth or obtaining money, and God knows best. We present to you the most prominent interpretations of shaving the beard in a dream, and before we conclude this article, we would like to note

title: Interpretation of a dream about biscuits according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing cookies in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man. He buys cookies, buys cakes, gives chocolate, eats sweet and salty cookies, makes Eid cakes for Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Cookies in a dream are among the strange dreams. And the different ones that we see in our dreams constantly because of the frequent consumption of cookies in life, eating them and loving them a lot, we also see them because the subconscious mind constantly thinks about them. Cookies can be seen in many different forms and meanings that convey to us many important meanings and associations, and we see them in completely different forms. We will also examine for you the interpretation of seeing cookies in a dream, which was interpreted by the great translator Ibn Sirin, who explained it to us in all its meanings completely, It carries for us many, many important meanings and implications that we will examine for you all the interpretations with their various meanings. Interpretation of cookies in a dream If you dream that you are eating, giving, taking, or stealing cookies, this means that you are leaving out some trivial matters and a small problem is bothering you. And if you dream that you are baking cookies, this indicates feelings of optimism and superiority and can also mean rising to status. To dream that you cannot reach a cookie means that someone else is trying to reap your rewards, or in other words, someone is trying to reap the rewards. Your hard work. If you manage to get the cookies, it means that you are fully aware of your surroundings and the people around you and it can mean that you are regaining control. Seeing or eating chocolate chip cookies symbolizes your feelings of guilt, and if you see yourself baking chocolate chip cookies, This indicates your intimate and emotional relationship with a specific person. If you dream that you are eating an oatmeal cookie, this means that you need to release yourself from time to time. Eating or baking a cookie indicates ill health and disruption of family peace with ridiculous pretexts. Interpretation of cookies in a dream for a son SereneSeeing cookies in a dream is evidence of rising prices in case one wants to obtain something. If one sees that he cannot easily access cookies in a dream, this means that there is someone trying to obtain the dreamer’s rewards. Access to A cookie is easily evidence that a person will reach his goals. Seeing someone eating pretzels in a dream is a sign of sincerity. Pretzels in a dream indicate that a person is struggling with thinking about life. Eating cookies in a dream is evidence of absolute calm. Kneading cookies and baking them in a dream is a sign of optimism and future goodness for a person. Seeing holiday cookies in a dream is evidence of the kind and beautiful words that people say about the dreamer. Cookies indicate good health.

title: Interpretation of the dream of giving banknotes to the dead by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of the dream of giving banknotes to the dead

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of offering banknotes to the deceased. Seeing the dead is one of the visions that cause panic and anxiety for some people, and the interpretation of this vision is determined by what you see among the dead in terms of deeds and deeds. What concerns us in this article is that we study all the associations and cases related to the dream of giving the dead money. Learn about Interpretation of a dream about giving banknotes to a deceasedInterpretation of a dream about giving banknotes to a deceased To see money represents prosperity, prosperity, victory, strength, ambition, many desires and desires accompanying each other without satisfaction, the constant need for more, and the tendency to achieve stability and stability despite the many life movements and trips from one location. To another. Seeing a banknote indicates the ceiling of ambition that rises day after day and the many goals that the owner wants to achieve, regardless of the difficulties and obstacles that stand between him and the distant desires that he is trying to realize. However, if you see the dead person giving you paper money, this indicates confusion. And the many problems that you may face in the next stage, due to the multiplication of responsibilities and tasks assigned to him and the necessity of neglect and taking firm steps. So that you do not lose your status and priorities in life. But if you see that you are giving the death note, this indicates the desire to get rid of heavy burdens and worries, get rid of all influences that negatively affect your lifestyle and stay away from worldly conflicts and disputes that have no value. Giving the deceased the paper Which expresses cooperation and mutual benefit, cleansing the hand of despicable actions and behaviors, moving towards achieving comfort and psychological peace, and achieving a degree of stability and reassurance away from an environment full of strife and strife. Interpretation of a dream about giving dead banknotes to Ibn Sirin: It is not worth anything. Ibn Sirin did not tell us about the interpretation. The special meaning of seeing paper money, but he discussed at length the meaning of the dirham and dinar coins, and by analogy we can distinguish some of the special connotations of this vision and link it to the gift. From the dead, and we explain it as follows: Seeing a gift of money to a dead person means kindness, breadth, good news, prosperity and well-being, a change of attitude from distress to joy and happiness, the ability to distinguish right from wrong, right from wrong and choosing the right way to walk. And achieving what is desired. Ibn Sirin believes that everything that the dead offers is beneficial to the dreamer, especially if it is one of their loved ones in the world, but seeing it taken from you is generally not worthy of praise, because it can represent theft, deprivation, decrease, and loss. And if you see the deceased giving you money, it means that Some responsibilities will shift into your possession, the volume of tasks assigned to you will double, and worry that you will not be able to perform these tasks as best as possible. Road. This vision can also indicate taking a trust that you need to keep and handing it over to the appropriate authority, receiving an inheritance that will benefit you in the long run, or fulfilling a will and trust.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fingerprint in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fingerprint in a dream The fingerprint is one of the distinctive marks on a person's palm and cannot be likened to another person. Each person carries his fingerprint that distinguishes him from others and is sometimes used in official transactions in addition to a signature or as an alternative for those who cannot read or write. The person who dreams in his life and is sometimes an expression of a person who does many things at the same time Other concepts you will learn about in this detailed article. Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing a fingerprint in a dream A person's fingerprint in his dream expresses that the person has made a great effort to achieve many things in his life. The fingerprint in a dream can be an expression of owning all the things that a person does in life and doing them correctly. When a person sees himself without a thumb, this is a dream that does not bode well and expresses the coming of poverty and loss of money in the visionary. If the footprint appears in the dream and is dirty, this is an indication that the dreamer will achieve his dreams and aspirations. If a person sees in his dream that his thumb is longer than the rest of the fingers, this is a sign that the dreamer is facing many crises and problems. When a person sees that his thumb is injured, this is an expression of that person's loss in many things. If a merchant loses in his goods, &c. Sometimes, the dreamer's footprint that he walks on is an indication that a group of his friends are not loyal to him. Interpretation of the footprint in the dream of an unmarried girl When an unmarried girl sees herself signing a footprint in her dream, this dream indicates that she will get married soon and it will affect her marriage contract. Interpretation of the footprint in the dream of a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that she is a footprint of something, this indicates that her husband will run a profitable business through which he will earn a lot of money. Interpretation of the footprint in the dream of a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees a dream in a dream, the dream indicates that the pregnant woman and her fetus are in good health and there are no problems in her pregnancy. Some interpretations of the footprint in a dream If a person sees his thumb in his sleep, this is evidence that he prays Fajr and maintains it. When the thumb of the left hand appears in the dreamer's dream, it is an expression of the daughters or the sister of the sister behind me. When a man sees in his dream the five fingers on his hand, this is a clear expression of the five daily prayers. The long thumb in a dream is an unpopular vision, while the dirty thumb is good news Fears of the fortune teller disappear. Seeing one's fingerprint in one's dreams can be an expression of one's demand for testimony about something. Seeing fingers in a dream can be an expression of the arrival of a lot of food and a lot of goodness for the dreamer. Each finger of the hand expresses the prayer of prayer and the thumb indicates dawn and the index finger for noon. The middle finger for noon, the small finger for sunset and the pinky for dinner.

Some interpretations of a fingerprint in a dream: If a person sees his thumb in his sleep, this is evidence that he should pray the dawn prayer and protect it. When the thumb of the left hand appears in the dreamer’s dream, it is an expression About daughters or sister's sister behind me. When a man sees in his dream the five fingers on his hand, this is a clear expression of the five daily prayers. A long thumb in a dream is an unpopular vision, while a dirty thumb is good news and fears will disappear from the fortuneteller. It could be a vision A person's fingerprint in his dreams is an expression of his request to bear witness about something. Seeing fingers in a dream can be an expression of the arrival of a lot of food and a lot of goodness to the dreamer. Each finger of the hand expresses the prayer of prayer, the thumb indicates dawn, and the index finger indicates noon. The middle finger is in the period Noon, small for sunset and pink for dinner.

title: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream: There are many different types of animals in the world, some of which may be classified as predators that may harm other creatures around them, and there are so-called pets that may be raised in homes and do not harm those around them, while the cheetah is considered one of those classified animals. It is a predator that can kill a person if he takes it. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream: What distinguishes the cheetah is its great speed in hunting its prey, and it is a predatory animal found in many countries of the world. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream can indicate many signs and good tidings for the dreamer, such as: Seeing a tiger in a dream can be considered The tiger in the dreamer's dream is a sign of honor and care for God, whether male or female. While many commentators interpreted the tiger as one of the symbols of extravagance that characterizes the fortuneteller. It can also indicate in the dreamer's dream that there is an enemy around him who may want to harm him. It is also a sign On the presence of a hypocritical man in a dreamer who deceives. It is said that the tiger is one of the signs that the fortuneteller is righteous and belongs to a family distinguished by its good morals. However, if a girl sees the skin of a tiger, it is a sign of a high dowry during her engagement. Also, if the leopard attacks an unmarried woman, then this It indicates that there is something that seeks to be its share. But seeing a tiger in a married woman’s dream indicates a lot of goodness in her life. A married woman’s hugging a leopard is considered a sign that she will become pregnant soon. It should be noted that a tiger in a pregnant woman is a sign that she will give birth to a child. Male. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing rotten eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a black panther in a dream. There are many types of cheetah that have different colors and each one is distinguished from the other by many characteristics, while the black panther can symbolize strength, but seeing the black panther in A dream can have many interpretations, and we mention them: - It can be considered a sign of the injustice of the ruler in the country in which the fortuneteller is present. The black panther is also a sign of overcoming difficult periods and many problems in the life of the fortuneteller. It is a sign of the dreamer killing enemies and overcoming them. While the dreamer sees that he is riding a black panther, this can be considered a sign of his high status in his work. However, the marriage of a cheetah to a man indicates his marriage to a person of bad character and morals. If a man is afraid of a tiger, this indicates his divorce from his wife in the future. Nearby. The tiger sitting in the dreamer’s house is one of the signs of immorality for the pioneer. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Al-Hawawshi in a dream in detail by the most famous interpreters. A cheetah attack in a dream. Since the cheetah can be considered a predatory animal, its attack is considered fatal to humans, so it can only exist In places full of forests and where there are no residents, a tiger attack in a dream can be indicated by several of the following signs: -If a person sees that he can escape from a tiger, this indicates that he will escape from problems and get rid of them.

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing nails in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing nails if they are black or yellow? It means evil or illness that befalls you. What is the meaning of seeing nails being removed? It means extreme fear of some things. What is the interpretation of seeing short nails when you are a businessman? This means that you will go bankrupt and lose your money. What is the interpretation of seeing nails that are black or yellow? What does it mean to see colored nails? It means that happy news comes to you from your husband. What is the interpretation of seeing nails falling out? It means intense sadness. Interpretation of seeing nails. Dreaming of removing nails means extreme fear of some things and may indicate the presence of misfortunes in your life. Polishing nails with cosmetics means that you can Withstand obstacles, and you are a person who deserves to bear responsibility. To dream of cutting your nails means that you need to renew your life with your wife and that you are bored. If your nails are white and beautiful, this means that you are following the path of safety in your life and facing crises. To dream of short nails, and you are a businessman , means that you will go bankrupt and lose your money. Long nails mean a lot of money. Falling nails means great sadness or losing all your money at once. Seeing a dream about nails for single people. Long nails for single people means that you have great external beauty or that you take great care of it. Interpretation of seeing nails And her condition is good, it means that she has accepted a new job or a great success that she will achieve in the client’s life. If the girl finds that she is cutting her nails, she will be exposed to a great misfortune caused by someone close to her. Biting nails means problems and obstacles that she needs to prepare well for. Seeing cleaning nails Dreaming about cleaning nails In a dream, or frying and taking care of it, means that you are a person who has left the door of sin and wrongdoing, and has finally turned to the path of God Almighty. The dream may be a call to God and repentance to Him; Because cutting and cleaning nails is a Sunnah from the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. And if you are a truly religious person, then cleaning your nails means that you are removing sadness from your heart, and you will change your mind and you will soon hear good news. Interpretation of a dream about nails falling out The interpretation of seeing nails falling out in your dream is not good, there is an attack Violence towards you from your family. You will be exposed to a difficult situation that will cause you great harm and embarrassment. Commentators said that seeing your hands without nails at all. This means that it is harmful for you, and perhaps the blow will be from your wife or from your sister. A dream about nails for a married woman if the nails are black or yellow. If you dream that your nails are broken, this means that you will suffer physical damage and will suffer from illness for a short time. Colored nails mean happy news coming to you from your husband. Then it was said that the dream of trimming nails represents a marital quarrel that lasts for a long time and ends and stability returns again. If your nails are poor, this means that you do not pay much attention to your man, and God knows best.
